import React from 'react'; export default function About() { return(

Hi, I'm Bharath.
I love to build amazing apps.

An AWS Certified developer with over 4 years experience in Software Development specializing in building highly scalable and responsive web applications from front to back.

Work with me! See My Past Work
) }
